knimeNode.name: PageSpeed Insight
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node submits URL(s) to Google PageSpeed Insights service to pull PageSpeed scores and other metrics provided by PageSpeed.

fullDescription.intro: This node submits URL(s) to Google PageSpeed Insights service to pull PageSpeed scores and other metrics provided by PageSpeed.
fullDescription.option: Google API Key that's necessary to use the service.
A selection of String columns from the input table, the chosen column will be used in URL(s) submission.
A PageSpeed option to filter out third party resources during evaluation, default is false.
A PageSpeed option for locale, default is en_US (format should be [language code]_[country code]).
A PageSpeed option for choosing between mobile and desktop strategy, default is desktop.

ports.inPort: An input table that contains a URL column
ports.outPort: An output table with Google PageSpeed results
